synonyms: adhokṣaja—Lord Adhokṣaja; padma—lotus; gadā—club; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; kara—in hand; upendra—Lord Upendra; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; cakra—disc; padma—lotus; kara—in hand.
translation: "Lord Adhokṣaja holds the lotus, club, conch and disc. Lord Upendra holds the conch, club, disc and lotus.
